title: Norman Ferguson - The First World War.epub
description:
Have you ever wondered who fired the first British shot of World War One? Or who claimed the glory of downing the Red Baron?

Who was the first WW1 soldier to receive the Victoria Cross? And what has Winnie the Pooh got to do with it all?

Telling the stories of the battles, the aircraft, the weapons, the soldiers, the poets, the campaigns and the many heroes, Norman Ferguson delves deep into the history of the Ã¢â‚¬ËœGreat WarÃ¢â‚¬â„¢. Through anecdotes and statistics, and drawing on letters, speeches and official reports, this comprehensive miscellany is a compelling guide to the war that transformed and marked forever the course of twentieth-century history.

Review

'A new book - both amazing and poignant - lists facts, dates and statistics connected to the Great War.' The Daily Express

About the Author

Norman Ferguson is an author of books on history, aviation and modern culture. He has worked as a web editor and copywriter.
